item.description:
Do You Want to Quickly and Easily Replace Your Income & Build Four to Five-Figure a Month Positive Cash Flow with Connecticut Real-Estate Investment-Property Once and For All?

Regardless of Your Current Situation ... There's Absolutely No Reason You Can't Land Your First Profitable Investment Deal in the Next 120 Days With This PROVEN, TIME-TESTED and EXCLUSIVE OPPORTUNITY!

Starts March 20th in Meriden, CT. Pricing varies according to tuition plan you choose.

Learn more at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=v&i=537

"I want to take a moment to thank you for your guidance throughout the Fast Track coaching program. The name for the program is perfect because it truly speeds up the learning process and allows you to take action with the confidence of having a very experienced team behind you.

I came to your program after taking a high level coaching program with limited success and really felt like I was left hanging to figure things out on my own.

Within three months of starting your program I have two great deals under contract. I have a three family property that I am closing next week with 100% funding, without using any of my own money! I am also closing on a two family property in a great area with 93% owner financing.

The marketing and creative financing techniques that I learned from you put the pieces of the puzzle together for me and made me a much better and creative negotiator.

I know my future is looking more secure and I will look back at this moment in time and be grateful that I teamed up with the CT REIA coaching program. Thank you!" Eric Munson

Read more testimonials at http://www.ctreia.com/events.php?a=v&i=537

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CT REIA Spring 2013 "Fast Track" Real Estate Coaching Program
